trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Camp Verde
There were no other sightings in Camp Verde on or around April 30th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsAS I WAS WALKING MY DOG AT THE CLIFF CASTLE CASINO SOUTH PARKING LOT IN CAMP VERDE, ARIZONA, WHEN I NOTICED A BRIGHT LIGHT IN THE WESTERN SKY JUST ABOVE THE MOUNTAINS. I HAD JUST GOTTEN OUT OF THE CAR WHICH WAS FACING THE WEST AND THERE IT WAS, SO BRIGHT, YOU COULDN'T MISS IT. AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS PROBABLY A SMALL PLANE (THERE'S A PRIVATE AIRSTRIP RIGHT THERE BY THE CASINO, AND ANOTHER AIRPORT NEARBY IN COTTONWOOD). HOWEVER, THE LIGHTS WERE FLASHING RAPIDLY, NOT IN THE PATTERN OF STROBES. THEN I THOUGHT IT MIGHT BE A HELICOPTER BECAUSE IT SEEMED TO BE MAINTAINING THE SAME POSITION IN THE SKY BUT AS FAR AS I KNOW HELICOPTER LIGHTS DON'T FLASH DIFFERENT COLORS, SO I RULED THAT OUT. THE LIGHTS WERE FLASHING RAPIDLY, TURNING FROM BRIGHT BLUE TO WHITE AND OCCASIONALLY RED, AND BACK AGAIN. I COULDN'T MAKE OUT AN EXACT SHAPE BUT ONCE IN A WHILE A WHITE BEAM OF LIGHT WOULD FLASH UNDER THE OBJECT AND THEN DISAPPEAR. IT REMAINED IN THE SAME PLACE THE ENTIRE TIME I WATCHED IT. I FELT THRILLED TO SEE IT, AT THE SAME TIME VERY CALM, AND AS I LEFT TO GO INTO THE CASINO, A GREAT SENSE OF PEACE. I LOOKED BACK JUST BEFORE GOING IN, AND IT WAS STILL THERE. SUBMITTED: MAY 2, 2009 GAIL BERRY, SEDONA, AZ
